description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. The lord of insanity, Cthulhu, has lost his powers and the only way to regain them is by becoming a true hero! From the makers of the popular RPG, Breath of Death VII. Features 12 playable characters, a 6-10 hour quest, branching LV-Ups, an insanity system, over 20 songs, etc! Now enhanced with Cthulhu's Angels remix mode, director's commentary, new difficulty, and more!
